output_list.criticism: The function doesn't check for the condition where the sender of the transaction is not allowed to receive the tokens. Assigned same score for different vulnerabilities. Output not in required format.
The function doesn't check if the new owner is not already the owner of the contract. Assigned same score for different vulnerabilities. Output not in required format.
The function doesn't check if the sender has been whitelisted to transfer tokens. Assigned same score for different vulnerabilities. Output not in required format.
The function lacks an 'require' statement to check if the 'target' address is already the owner of the contract. Assigned same score for different vulnerabilities. Output not in required format.
The function doesn't check if the 'from' address is not already the owner of the contract. Assigned same score for different vulnerabilities. Output not in required format.
